Open the "Contacts" application.
Open the Contacts app to access and manage contact information.
Click the "First name" text field to input the contact's first name.
Type "John" into the "First name" field.
Input "Doe" into the "Last name" field.
Scroll down to reveal more options for the phone label.
Click "Mobile" to select it as the label for the phone number.
Enter '123-456-7890' into the phone number field.
